name: Diurnal
about: Developed as a tool that applies a minimalist productivity framework to help users focus on the most important assignments day by day. This app aims to increase productivity and reduce burnout.

name: notARealStore
about: NotARealStore is a fully functional, fully responsive online clothing store waiting to become the new home of your clothing line and brand. The store can handle a constantly increasing inventory, credit card payments, sending purchase confirmation emails and user authorization and authentication.

name: Blank Page
about: Blank Page is a simple but highly useful AI powered tool for artists and creators to get out of a creative block. With one click, Blank Page provides you with an AI generated premise for your next story, ilustration, animation, you name it.
